name: Portola Food Pantry
description: Each month, Family Connections hosts two food pantries for families that qualify. These programs serve over 200 households each month, providing fresh produce, pantry items, eggs, and necessities. Food Pick-up: second Friday of the month, 2:00 pm Food Distribution Application - Family Connections' food program has changed. We will no longer open registration twice a month. The application for our January – March 2026 - Food Distribution applications is now closed. Contact family_support@fccenter

howToGetIt: Food Distribution Application Eligibility Requirements: - Must be a current San Francisco resident, AND - Must have at least one child under 18 years old to qualify For more questions regarding eligibility requirements, please contact family_support@fccenters.org.
address: 2565 San Bruno Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94134
